text:
John Carroll Lynch (born August 1, 1963) is an American actor and director. He became known for his role as Norm Gunderson in "Fargo". He is also known for his television work on the ABC sitcom "The Drew Carey Show" as Steve Carey, as well as on ' and ' as Twisty the Clown.
His movies include "Off", "Gran Torino", "Shutter Island", "Ted 2", "The Invitation", and "Zodiac". Most recently, he played McDonald's co-founder Maurice McDonald in "The Founder".
Lynch directed his first movie with the 2017 movie "Lucky" starring Harry Dean Stanton.
